mapper.select: select r_num, b_num, r_name, r_content, to_char(r_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as r_date from spring_reply where b_num = #{b_num} order by r_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into spring_reply(r_num, b_num, r_name, r_content, r_pwd) values(spring_reply_seq.nextval, #{b_num}, #{r_name}, #{r_content}, #{r_pwd})
